revised_title: Advancements in Ultrahigh-Bit-Rate Optical Transmission in Japan
tldr: This article reviews the progress made in ultrahigh-bit-rate optical fiber transmission systems in Japan, focusing on 100 Gbit transmission systems and related technologies. Key technologies discussed include ultrashort optical pulse generation, all-optical multiplexing-demultiplexing, and optical timing extraction techniques. The article highlights successful 100 Gbit transmission experiments and future prospects for the field.
